lead_paragraph: NUGENT--Joseph C.,Jr., on June 22nd. General Partner of the brokerage firm of Mabon, Nugent & Co., NY, retired in 1991. Beloved husband of Joan Tildesley Nugent, loving father of Mark, Gregory, and step-father of Arthur, Jill, Lauren and Susan; beloved brother of Constance Nugent McQuade; eight grandchildren, ten step-grandchildren and one step-great-grandchild. There are no visitation hours. Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated on Monday, June 27th, 11:00am at Sacred Heart RC Church, 751 Main Avenue, Bay Head, NJ 08742. Services were entrusted to the Thompson Memorial Home, 310 Broad St., Red Bank, NJ. In lieu of flowers, the family requests that memorial donations be made in his memory to either the Covenant House, 330 Washington Street, Newark, NJ 07102-2630 (https://nj.covenanthouse. org), or Parker Family Health Center, 211 Shrewsbury Avenue, Red Bank, NJ 07701 (www.parkerfamily healthcenter.org). 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NUGENT, JOSEPH C.
